Ability.Name: Autotarget Low HP
Ability.Lua:
if UnitExists("target") and UnitIsDead("target") == nil and UnitIsFriend("player", "target") and UnitCanCooperate("player","target") then PQR_CustomTarget = "target" PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
else
PQR_CustomTarget = "player" PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers() lowhpmembers = 0 local lowest = 100
if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 0, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) local memberhp = 100 * UnitHealth(member) / UnitHealthMax(member) if UnitInRange(member) and UnitIsFriend("player", member) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(member) == nil then if UnitGroupRolesAssigned(member) == "TANK" then memberhp = memberhp - 1 end if UnitThreatSituation(member) == 3 then memberhp = memberhp - 3 end if UnitBuffID(member, 53563) ~= nil then memberhp = memberhp + 4 end if memberhp < 95 then lowhpmembers = lowhpmembers +1 end if memberhp < lowest then PQR_CustomTarget = member lowest = memberhp PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth(PQR_CustomTarget) / UnitHealthMax(PQR_CustomTarget) end end end
end
Ability.LuaBefore:
if not functions then function DontDispel(t) local buff = { 96328, 96325, 96326, 92876, 34941, 97599, 92878, 30108, 86788, 30108 } for _,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitDebuffID(t,v) then return true end end end
functions = 1 end

Ability.Name: Judgement
Ability.Lua:
local CCdebuff = { 118, 28272, 61305, 61721, 61780, 28271, 1499, 19503, 90337, 82676, 5782, 6770, 2094, 49203, 19386, 64044, 3355, 82691, 33395, 339 } for i, v in ipairs(CCdebuff) do if UnitDebuffID("target", v) then return false end end
local SoI = UnitBuffID("player", 20165) local SoJ = UnitBuffID("player", 20164) local SoR = UnitBuffID("player", 20154) local SoT = UnitBuffID("player", 31801) local JotP1, _, _, _, _, _, judgeexpire1 = UnitBuffID("player", 53655) local JotP2, _, _, _, _, _, judgeexpire2 = UnitBuffID("player", 53656) local JotP3, _, _, _, _, _, judgeexpire3 = UnitBuffID("player", 53657) local inRange = IsSpellInRange("Judgement", "target") local myMana = 100 * UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player")
if UnitCanAttack("player", "target") and inRange == 1 then if (SoR ~= nil or SoT ~= nil or SoJ ~= nil or SoI ~= nil) and JotP1== nil and JotP2 == nil and JotP3 == nil then return true elseif JotP1 ~= nil then judgeexpire1 = (judgeexpire1 - GetTime()) if judgeexpire1 < 5 then return true end elseif JotP2 ~= nil then judgeexpire2 = (judgeexpire2 - GetTime()) if judgeexpire2 < 5 then return true end elseif JotP3 ~= nil then judgeexpire3 = (judgeexpire3 - GetTime()) if judgeexpire3 < 5 then return true end end end
Ability.LuaBefore:
if not functions then function DontDispel(t) local buff = { 96328, 96325, 96326, 92876, 34941, 97599, 92878, 30108, 86788, 30108 } for _,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitDebuffID(t,v) then return true end end end
functions = 1 end

Ability.Name: Holy Shock
Ability.Lua:
local canAttack = true local CCdebuff = { 118, 28272, 61305, 61721, 61780, 28271, 1499, 19503, 90337, 82676, 5782, 6770, 2094, 49203, 19386, 64044, 3355, 82691, 33395, 339 } for i, v in ipairs(CCdebuff) do if UnitDebuffID("target", v) then canAttack = false end end
local myMana = 100 * UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") local enemy = UnitIsEnemy("player", "target")
if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 94 then return true elseif myMana > 20 and enemy and IsSpellInRange("GetSpellInfo(20473)", "target") == 1 and canAttack then CastSpellByID(20473, "target") end

Ability.Name: Denounce
Ability.Lua:
local CCdebuff = { 118, 28272, 61305, 61721, 61780, 28271, 1499, 19503, 90337, 82676, 5782, 6770, 2094, 49203, 19386, 64044, 3355, 82691, 33395, 339 } for i, v in ipairs(CCdebuff) do if UnitDebuffID("target", v) then return false end end
local Denounce, _, _, _, _, _, Dexpire = UnitDebuffID("target", 85509) local target = UnitExists("target") local enemy = UnitIsEnemy("player", "target") local targetHealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
if target and enemy and PQR_IsMoving(0.1) == false then if Denounce ~= nil then Dexpire = (Dexpire - GetTime()) if PQR_CustomTargetHP > 90 and Dexpire <= 3 then return true elseif PQR_CustomTargetHP > 90 and targetHealth < 50 then return true end elseif PQR_CustomTargetHP > 90 then return true end end
Ability.LuaBefore:
if not functions then function DontDispel(t) local buff = { 96328, 96325, 96326, 92876, 34941, 97599, 92878, 30108, 86788, 30108 } for _,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitDebuffID(t,v) then return true end end end

Ability.Name: Cleanse Old
Ability.Lua:
function CheckMagic(unitid) local i = 1 local buff,_,_,count,bufftype,duration = UnitDebuff(unitid, i) while buff do if bufftype == "Magic" or bufftype == "Poison" or bufftype == "Disease" then return true end i = i + 1; buff,_,_,count,bufftype,duration = UnitDebuff(unitid, i) end end
local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers()
if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) if UnitInRange(member) and UnitIsCharmed(member) == nil and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(member) == nil and PQR_IsOutOfSight(member) == false then if CheckMagic(member) then PQR_CustomTarget = member end end end
if CheckMagic(PQR_CustomTarget) and (not UnitDebuffID(PQR_CustomTarget,30108) or not UnitDebuffID(PQR_CustomTarget,34941)) then return true end if CheckMagic("player") and (not UnitDebuffID("player", 30108) or not UnitDebuffID("player",34941)) then PQR_CustomTarget = "player" return true end
Ability.LuaBefore:
if not functions then function DontDispel(t) local buff = { 96328, 96325, 96326, 92876, 34941, 97599, 92878, 30108, 86788, 30108 } for _,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitDebuffID(t,v) then return true end end end
functions = 1 end

Ability.Name: AT Smart Low HP
Ability.Lua:
if not healinit then
function CalculateHP(t) local incomingheal = 0 if UnitGetIncomingHeals(t) then incomingheal = UnitGetIncomingHeals(t) end return 100 * ( UnitHealth(t) + incomingheal ) / UnitHealthMax(t) end
function SafeTarget(t) if IsSpellInRange(tostring(GetSpellInfo(2050)),t) == 1 and UnitIsCharmed(t) == nil and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(t) == nil and UnitCanCooperate("player",t) and PQR_IsOutOfSight(t) == false then return true end end
function DontDispel(units) local debuff = { 96328, 96325, 96326, 92876, 34941, 97599, 92878, 30108, 86788, 30108 } for _,v in ipairs(debuff) do if UnitDebuffID(units,v) then return true end end end
function DangerousMagic(t) local buff = { 5782, 118, 122, 339, 1499, 6358, 605, 20066, 8122, 853, 5484, 71757, 104601, 107629, 99567 } for _,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitDebuffID(t,v) then return true end end end
healinit = true
end
if SafeTarget("target") then PQR_CustomTarget = "target" PQR_CustomTargetHP = CalculateHP("target") else lowhpmembers = 0 priodispel = nil PQR_CustomTarget = "player" PQR_CustomTargetHP = CalculateHP("player") local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers() if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) local memberhp = CalculateHP(member) if SafeTarget(member) then if UnitGroupRolesAssigned(member) == "TANK" and UnitBuffID(member, 53563) == nil then memberhp = memberhp - 1 else memberhp = memberhp + 3 end if UnitThreatSituation(member) == 3 then memberhp = memberhp - 3 end if memberhp < 90 then lowhpmembers = lowhpmembers +1 end if memberhp < PQR_CustomTargetHP then PQR_CustomTarget = member PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth(PQR_CustomTarget) / UnitHealthMax(PQR_CustomTarget) end if DangerousMagic(member) and not DontDispel(member) then priodispel = member end
end end
if group == "party" then if CalculateHP("player") < CalculateHP(PQR_CustomTarget) then PQR_CustomTarget = "player" PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") elseif DangerousMagic("player") and not DontDispel("player") then priodispel = "player" end end
if priodispel then PQR_CustomTarget = priodispel end
end
Ability.LuaBefore:
if not functions then function DontDispel(t) local buff = { 96328, 96325, 96326, 92876, 34941, 97599, 92878, 30108, 86788, 30108 } for _,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitDebuffID(t,v) then return true end end end
functions = 1 end

Ability.Name: AT Smart Low HP - No DD or DM
Ability.Lua:
if not healinit then
function CalculateHP(t) local incomingheal = 0 if UnitGetIncomingHeals(t) then incomingheal = UnitGetIncomingHeals(t) end return 100 * ( UnitHealth(t) + incomingheal ) / UnitHealthMax(t) end
function SafeTarget(t) if IsSpellInRange(tostring(GetSpellInfo(635)),t) == 1 and UnitIsCharmed(t) == nil and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(t) == nil and UnitCanCooperate("player",t) and PQR_IsOutOfSight(t) == false then return true end end
healinit = true
end
if SafeTarget("target") then PQR_CustomTarget = "target" PQR_CustomTargetHP = CalculateHP("target") else lowhpmembers = 0 PQR_CustomTarget = "player" PQR_CustomTargetHP = CalculateHP("player") local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers() local targethp = CalculateHP("player") + 20 if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) local memberhp = CalculateHP(member) if SafeTarget(member) then if UnitGroupRolesAssigned(member) == "TANK" and UnitBuffID(member, 53563) == nil then memberhp = memberhp - 1 else memberhp = memberhp + 3 end if UnitThreatSituation(member) == 3 then memberhp = memberhp - 3 end if memberhp < 88 then lowhpmembers = lowhpmembers +1 end if memberhp < targethp then PQR_CustomTarget = member targethp = memberhp PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth(PQR_CustomTarget) / UnitHealthMax(PQR_CustomTarget) end
end end
end
if CalculateHP("player") < CalculateHP(PQR_CustomTarget) then PQR_CustomTarget = "player" PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") end
Ability.LuaBefore:
if not functions then function DontDispel(t) local buff = { 96328, 96325, 96326, 92876, 34941, 97599, 92878, 30108, 86788, 30108 } for _,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitDebuffID(t,v) then return true end end end
functions = 1 end

Ability.Name: -- Bubba Functions
Ability.Lua:
if not functions then function RaidSize() if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then local RSize = GetNumRaidMembers() else local RSize = GetNumPartyMembers() end local numNeeded = 0 if RSize <= 5 then numNeeded = 0 return numNeeded elseif RSize <= 10 then numNeeded = 1 return numNeeded elseif RSize <= 25 then numNeeded = 2 return numNeeded elseif RSize >= 20 then numNeeded = 3 return numNeeded end end
function CCdebuff(t) local CCs = { 118, 28272, 61305, 61721, 61780, 28271, 1499, 19503, 90337, 82676, 5782, 6770, 2094, 49203, 19386, 64044, 3355, 82691, 33395, 339 } local hasCC = 0 for i, v in ipairs(CCs) do if UnitDebuffID(t, v) then hasCC = 1 end end
return hasCC end
functions = 1 end
Ability.LuaBefore:
if not functions then function DontDispel(t) local buff = { 96328, 96325, 96326, 92876, 34941, 97599, 92878, 30108, 86788, 30108 } for _,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitDebuffID(t,v) then return true end end end
functions = 1 end
